external_games.name: DS de Yomu Series: Tezuka Osamu Hi no Tori 1

name: DS de Yomu Series: Tezuka Osamu Hi no Tori 1
summary: Volume 1 (Dawn, Future, Yamato/Space, Karma) of the "Hi no Tori" manga series created by Osamu Tezuka. It consists of 12 books, each of which tells a separate, self-contained story and takes place in a different era. The plots go back and forth from the remote future to prehistoric times.
